divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a Very Bright whitish-yellow Pulsating Triangular Light in the Eastern Sky while leaving the local Kmart. The light was probably a satallite since it was not moving. I was getting my 2 toddlers into my truck and since I am a MUFON Field Investigator, I waited till I got home to check the Satallite Tracking Websites to see what it was.
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There was one other sighting in Philadelphia on or around December 13th 2008
Summary: Bright Pulsating Triangular Light in the Eastern Sky.
